review: I was admitted to hospital with cellulitis/osteomyelitis. I am a diabetic and a heart patient. My dosage was decreased several times due to loss of kidney function and landed at 500 mg IV therapy after two weeks of daily treatment. After 4 1/2 weeks, my levels were toxic and my kidney function was at the lowest ever 21. At that point, treatment was discontinued. However, I lost my sense of taste and have been unable to taste salt completely. It has been 3 weeks now with the loss of taste. I talked With two other IV antibiotic patients on Vancomycin and they reported a loss of taste sensation as well. I have not read about this side effect on any of the web sites. Why is this side effect not included?

My father was taking this dug two times a day every twelve hours. Started off good  then developed a rash. Then got terribly sick. Went to the hospital and went into total organ failure. Would not recommend this drug.
Vancocin HCl (vancomycin):It cleared my skull based osteomyelitis fast.
